title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Simulation/VR-Based Language Support for University Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five stages of language education design processes via VR simulations.
Learners can develop elementary-level language education modules using instructional design tools in mobile environments.
Learners can revise and enhance language education designs based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
